name: WALL•E
description:
Race, fly and shoot as you take robots WALL•E and EVE through a fast-paced adventure. From the desolate wastelands of Earth to the Axiom space cruiser, throw cubes and avoid obstacles while you explore 9 worlds filled with non-stop action and adventure, along with multi-player challenges. Dodge dangerous enemies, carry out intense missions and navigate your way through a futuristic galaxy!

*Cinematic action: Relive some of the movie's most thrilling moments, playing as WALL•E and EVE. Interact with a multitude of robots and characters from the movie.

*Huge variety of gameplay: Explore action-packed worlds, blast enemies and obstacles, experience fast flying action, and race through the galaxy to save the planet.

*Multi-player: Play with up to 4 friends in head-to-head multi-player challenges or in 2 player co-op levels. 3 multi-player games available only on the Wii.

* Wii Zapper compatible
